Html:
I have started using the previous version 2.1 a week ago. I am a big fun of theorycrafting and this program seems to cover all aspects that i need .. at least from what i have seen this far.
Today i dowloaded the new 2.1.1 version, and it simply doesnt want to start.
After i run rawr.exe, the usual black window with the different modules icons appear, and in statusbar it says Loading, please wait.
But after a couple of minutes it dissapears and nothing else happens.
No suspect proces is left behind in task manager, and the processor cools down in a normal idle 1-2%.

After this i try the previous version .. that is 2.1 .. and it runs smoothly with no warnings or errors (so i'm stuck with it till i find the glitch).

I am using Window Vista Ultimate on an AMD 64x2 platform.

Any ideeas what should i try?
I am having the same problem, but I am having it with 2.1 as well  :(  If anyone has any ideas it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks
That's very odd. Try a restart; if that doesn't work, IM me, cnervig@hotmail.com on MSN, or Astro tSD on AIM.

Also having this issue with 2.1.1.

First time loading, it started up fine, albeit a bit slow (Same with 2.1 - usually about 2 mins for it to load fully.) Tried to load character from armory, received the js script error mentioned in a prior discussion. Was able to save the character and I closed the program then attempted to restart it.. Since then it has done exactly what the OP stated above. Begins to load then just disappears into a black hole.....(I assume :])

<abbr></abbr>
<abbr></abbr>
<input type="hidden" value="134618" id="ctl00_ctl00_MasterContent_Content_PostRepeater_ctl06_PostId" name="ctl00$ctl00$MasterContent$Content$PostRepeater$ctl06$PostId" />
Also having this issue with 2.1.1.

First time loading, it started up fine, Was able to save the character and I closed the program then attempted to restart it.. Since then it has done exactly what the OP stated above.
Having the same problem.....

Hey, I made a new build which may fix the problem. Try this build out: http://dl-client.getdropbox.com/u/38028/Rawr%20b2.1.2.zip

Let me know if it still gives you guys problems.
This has fixed the issue, thanks!

This version is working excellent for me. Thank you very much.

Loads far faster than any previous version for me as well. :]
Working perfectly now. Thanks so much!

Ok, so I thought it was working perfectly. lol. When I try to upload information from wowhead, I get the dialog box asking if I want to continue and telling me it should take about 15 min. When I click to proceed the program will freeze up. I can leave it for hours and still will not do anything, I end up having to ctrl+alt+del to get it to close. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Well, you shouldn't need to use that menu item. Beyond that, do you have problems loading Wowhead.com pages?
